stories.text:
Our start up is looking for someone to create and lead a global sales force for us. We have a fully developed and sellable product and even some decent market traction but now need someone to help us recruit and manage an international sales team. We have very little infrastructure in place, very little budget, but a great product and aspirations of global dominance. The ideal candidate will be able to start from scratch and build structure and process around our proposition.

Valkyrie Engine (aka We3D) is software that lets anyone make cool 3D/AR content. It’s Canva for the metaverse with a web3 twist. It’s no-code 2D/3D/AR software where users can create content ranging from a presentation to an application to a piece of art, and then share on any platform or one-click mint them as an NFT onto multiple peer-to-peer marketplaces.

If you think you might be interested, please send a brief introduction to jim@talansoft.com
